column4: I can't get "locate" to work in dapper.  Is anyone else having the same problem?  It's been like it for about 2 weeks now.
it finds some files here and then it segfaults
yes but it seems to work
it finds a few files for me too
it finds the file, then it segfaults so it doesnt really matter
you should file a bug report and that's it
I'd like to file the fix with it though
start looking in locate bugzilla then or on google
I got that slocate bug eventually.  It was a buffer overflow - the buffer was declared as char ch[0]  (!)
